statements: SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT sensor_id, location, ph_level FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, ph_level FROM WaterQualityData WHERE chlorine_level > 1.5
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE location = 'River'
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, location FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY ph_level ASC
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT location, ph_level FROM WaterQualityData WHERE ph_level > 7.0 ORDER BY ph_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM WaterQualityData WHERE chlorine_level < 2.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(ph_level) AS average_ph, AVG(chlorine_level) AS average_chlorine FROM WaterQualityData;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE location = 'River' AND ph_level BETWEEN 6.5 AND 8.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading_time FROM sensors ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT location, water_quality FROM sensors WHERE water_quality='Good';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE water_quality='Good' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE reading_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_reading_value > 50
SELECT location, reading_time FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensors
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityReadings;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM WaterQualityReadings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_checkin FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'ACTIVE';
SELECT location_id, pH_level, turbidity FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE pH_level > 7 ORDER BY turbidity ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityReadings;
SELECT location_id, pH_level, timestamp FROM WaterQualityReadings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'offline';
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE pH_level < 5 OR turbidity > 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT reading_value, reading_time FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE reading_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM water_sources WHERE location='River Thames';
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources WHERE source_id=1;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT reading_value, reading_time FROM readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT reading_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityReadings;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time, temperature FROM WaterQualityReadings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, ph_level FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE ph_level > 7.0;
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE measurement_type = 'Water Quality';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT ph_level, temperature FROM WaterQualityReadings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'pH Sensor' ORDER BY installed_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, measurement_value FROM Sensors s JOIN Measurements m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE s.measurement_type = 'pH' AND m.measurement_value > 7.0;
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(m.measurement_id) AS num_measurements FROM Users u JOIN Measurements m ON u.user_id = m.sensor_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email ORDER BY num_measurements DESC;
